extendedInfo.description: Con-way Freight offers the best-in-class mobile tools and resources. This app provides you everything you need to get immediate visibility to your LTL shipments in one quick, convenient location:- Track your shipments with a large, easy-to-view map, as well as one-click access to shipment details, full history and related shipment documents- Get a quick and accurate Rate Quote (generic or specific to your pricing agreement)- View shipment documents (including Delivery Receipts, Bills of Ladings, Customs Documents, and more)- Find a local Service Center (including address and contact information)  A convenient list keeps your most recent rate quotes, documents, and tracked shipments handy, so you can easily check for updates without re-entering the same information again.  You must be a Con-way Freight web registered user to take advantage of this application. Register using the app, or visit www.con-way.com/freight to get started today.

reviews.comment: The idea is a good one! Its a good start. Some carriers don\'t have an app. It would be nice if we could use our camera and scan the pro.

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work as advertised. Doesn\'t recognize network connection. Poor layout and design. Con-way, your IT dept used to be better than this.
